title: EP 5: Sammie Knight - Business Strategies Through A Hunter’s Eyes
description:
Do you live your life and run your business like you’re about to lose the perfect shot? Going through the motions is easy - and it’s a one-way ticket to the depths of average. Take on a mindset that puts strategy first and sets a clear, immediate sight on the goal. 

Sammie Knight is a serial entrepreneur, lifelong hunter, and REMAX managing partner who forged his own path away from the corporate grind and toward a career filled with creativity and drive. Through everything, Sammie maintains a love of the outdoors and unstoppable energy.

On this episode of The Tactical Entrepreneur Podcast, Steve and Sammie dig into the parallels between hunting and business strategy, the need for extreme perseverance in entrepreneurship, developing a mindset that plans with the end result in mind, and how to set boundaries (or cut ties entirely) with unhealthy people for your own health and the health of your business. Tune in for an interview that will inspire you to take meaningful, strategic steps toward your next pursuit or great idea.

 

What You’ll Learn:

  • How Sammie is taking the mentorship and guidance he received as a younger man and paying them forward to new up-and-comers in the business world
  • What you can often learn when you decide to receive criticism from the people around you without getting defensive and with the intent to grow from it
  • Why knowing when to fire your customers is one of the best lessons you can take from running your business
  • And much more!

 

Favorite Quote:

“Think about how many times in business you get knocked down and how many times we want to go, ‘I think I will stay down this time.’ If you had, what you would have missed. And instead, you took the time, put the energy in place to get back up, dust yourself off, and go attack that business or the opportunity that you had in front of you. You know, it's, it's the survival of the fittest.”

 

  • Sammie Knight 

 

Connect with Sammie:

LinkedIn

 

How to Get Involved:

Steve Schabaker is the co-founder of Sheepdog Firearms and an entrepreneur, bestselling author, and marketer. Between his business and his content, Steve is educating firearm owners and armed professionals and setting a new standard for shops and training centers in the industry.

You can visit Sheepdog Firearms online or reach out directly to Steve at sschabacker@outlook.com.Check out this podcast on Apple Podcasts - don’t forget to subscribe, rate, and review!
